show_name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story - Kako to Mirai no Message
other_title: Tennis no Ouji-sama OVA Another Story: Kako to Mirai no Message
Prince of Tennis: Another Story - Messages From Past and Future
テニスの王子様　OVA ANOTHER STORY ～過去と未来のメッセージ
ending_theme: #1: "Iroasenai Ano Sora e (色褪せないあの空へ)" by STONES (eps 1, 3)
#2: "Sakamichi no Hate e (坂道の果てへ)" by Hyotei Eternity (ep 2)
#3: "Owaranai Ai (終わらない愛)" by Rikkai Young Kan (ep 4)
